workflows.display_title: VPN-4063 - Add warning to settings views on iOS (#5857)

head_commit.message:
VPN-4063 - Add warning to settings views on iOS (#5857)

* Fix VPN-4063: Add disconnect/reconnect settings change warning for ios

* Add strings.yaml updates

* Add tests

* Rename SettingsDisconnectWarning -> InformationCard

* Review updates: Use loader

* Remove warning from notifications view

* Update tests

* Remove commented out line

* Refactors

* Fix tests

* Address review request - maybe

* Update query for testSettings.js

* Fix unit test maybe

* Working on my machine

* Change string ID and fix spacing
